title: Mission Accomplished with Shea Serrano
description:
Attention all haters and losers: FOH. This week the boys are dialing in a true man of the people who needs absolutely zero introduction, but deserves one anyway. Shea Serrano—New York Times bestselling author, co-host of The Connect podcast and staff writer at the Ringer—is finally on The Only Podcast That Matters™ to talk chancla fu, Four Pins memories, the future of his podcast, being San Antonio famous, the presidential election, breaking up with Lil Wayne, being a dad, all time NBA fashion, his coaching style, the GOAT romantic comedies and much more.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
